mapper.select: SELECT NUM, CONTENT, REGIST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_NUM, QNA_NUM FROM TBL_PRODUCT_QNA_COMMENT WHERE QNA_NUM = #{qnaNum} ORDER BY UPDATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT_QNA_COMMENT (NUM, CONTENT, REGIST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_NUM, QNA_NUM) VALUES ( SEQ_PRODUCT_QNA_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, #{content}, SYSDATE , SYSDATE , #{userNum}, #{qnaNum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRODUCT_QNA_COMMENT SET CONTENT=#{content}, UPDATE_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE NUM=#{num}
